name: Haungharassk

trait.name: Salt Sensitivity
text: A pound of salt thrown onto the snail's skin deals 1d6 acid damage to the creature.

trait.name: Magical Properties
text: A creature that uses an action to touch the living snail gains 6 temporary hit points that last for 24 hours. Any creature or object that touches the living snail also gains the benefit of a remove curse spell. The snail loses these magical properties if it dies.

description:
Haungharassk is a magical snail as large as an elephant, with a shell of gleaming gold.
Source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage p. 258
